title: Gratitude: Responding to Thanks (Usefulness 5-10)
description: Traveler usefulness 5-10/10 phrases for the Responding to Thanks subcategory within Gratitude. Includes 8 card(s).

cards.english: (Response to "Thank you very much") You're welcome.
It's no big deal. / Don't mention it.
(Response to "Thank you very much") It's no big deal.
No, thank you! (The pleasure is mine)
cards.japanese: とんでもないです。 / こちらこそ。
